word: As a professor of theology at Oxford, Wycliffe preached the Word of God in the halls of the university. So faithfully did he present the truth to the students under his instruction, that he received the title of \93The Gospel Doctor.\94 But the greatest work of his life was to be the translation of the Scriptures into the English language. In a work on \93The Truth and Meaning of Scripture,\94 he expressed his intention to translate the Bible, so that every man in England might read, in the language in which he was born, the wonderful works of God.
